Class HDHRRecording

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.activation.FileDataSource
      • silicondust.HDHRRecording
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceDefaultMethods, PatternMatcherBean, javax.activation.DataSource
    @PatternRegex("(?is)^(?<title>.+)( (?<episodeNumber>S[0-9]+E[0-9]+))( (?<origAirDate>[0-9]{8}))( \\[(?<startTime>[0-9]{8}-[0-9]{4})\\])[.]mpg$")
public class HDHRRecording
extends javax.activation.FileDataSource
implements DataSourceDefaultMethods, PatternMatcherBean
    SiliconDust HDHomeRun recording.
